thread.title: Joanne Proshansky
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Joanne Proshansky

author: Joanne Proshansky
title: Joanne Proshansky
text:
Orange ct -don't ever lose Randy he was so trusting and truly the epitome of what a sales person should be
He guided me to the best tires for my car and with my budget in mind as a senior
He gave me the out the door price with no hidden fees or questions then told me they could do it same day if I wanted
All in 1hour
I was so pleased and will be recomending others to Town Fair Tire
